DOC.brief_summary: This is a Multicenter prospective diagnostic study.
DOC.brief_title: Interest of the Manual Exploration as a Supplement to the Coelioscopy in the Evaluation of the Resectability of Peritoneal Carcinosis
DOC.criteria: Over 18 years of age Patient Woman presenting a peritoneal carcinosis presumed ovarian origin Planned Coelioscopy (in 1st intention or in recurrence) WHO 0 2 Membership in a social security system Patient having given her written consent Male Contraindication in the coelioscopy Any associated medical or psychological condition which could compromise the capacity of the patient to participate in the study Patient deprived of freedom, under guardianship or guardianship
